LanguageData.CE_Apparel_TacVest.label: тактичний жилет
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_TacVest.description: A loadbearing vest with a number of pouches to store magazines and other equipment.\n\nSpeeds up reloading but is quite bulky to wear.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_Backpack.label: рюкзак
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_Backpack.description: A comfortable and spacious backpack for storing all kinds of items.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_KidBackpack.label: дитячий рюкзак
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_KidBackpack.description: A small backpack sized for a child.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_TribalBackpack.label: племінний рюкзак
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_TribalBackpack.description: Primitive backpack made from animal furs, useful for storing items when travelling.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_RadioPack.label: радіосумка
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_RadioPack.description: A long range radio pack, allowing a spotter to call in accurate, long range fire support from afar. Works in conjunction with binoculars.
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_ExoFrame.label: екзоскелет
LanguageData.CE_Apparel_ExoFrame.description: A powered exoframe with articulated joints, commonly used in industrial settings by workers handling heavy parts.\n\nIncreases lifting capacity, but is quite bulky to wear.
